appointment-type.title: What would you like to discuss?

options.hint: Explains the options for taking money from your defined contribution pension.
Divorce and dissolution can be complicated and stressful. Getting impartial guidance from us can make managing your pension options easier.
Speak to a pensions specialist if you are self-employed and need help understanding your pension options.
For people who have lost pension money due to a scam or fraud and need support.

radio-button.error: Select what type of appointment you would like.

sections.content: A free Pension Wise appointment explains the options for taking money from your defined contribution pension. It’s impartial and backed by government.

items: when you can access your pension pots
the different ways you can take money from your pension
how each option is usually taxed
how to spot and avoid scams.

sections.content: You can’t book a Pension Wise appointment if:
items: you only have a defined benefit pension (final salary or career-average salary) or
you only have an overseas pension.

eligibility-defined-contribution.title: Do you have a defined contribution pension?

sections.content: This is the type of pension where you or your employer pay into a pot, and its value can go up or down depending on investments. You can use our tool to [find out your pension type (opens in a new tab)](https://tool.moneyhelper.org.uk/en/pension-type/question-1).

radio-button.label: Do you have a defined contribution pension?

options.text: No, I have a different type of pension

radio-button.error: Please select whether you have a defined contribution pension.

radio-button.label: Are you aged 50 or over?
radio-button.error: Please select whether you are over 50 years old

eligibility-uk-pensions.title: Do you have any pensions based in the UK?

sections.content: You can book an appointment if you have at least one UK-based pension. For example, a pension you built up while working or living in the UK.

radio-button.label: Do you have any pensions based in the UK?
radio-button.error: Please select whether you only have an overseas pension

eligibility-age-exceptions.title: Do any of the following apply to you?

radio-button.label: Do any of the following apply to you?

options.text: You have inherited someone else’s pension
You are retiring early due to poor health
Your pension scheme allows early access (protected pension age)

radio-button.error: Please select whether any of the options apply to you

pension-wise-not-eligible.title: You’re not eligible for a Pension Wise appointment

sections.content: You can’t book a Pension Wise appointment if:
items: you only have a defined benefit pension (final salary or career-average salary) or
you only have an overseas pension.

sections.content: We can still help if you’re not eligible for Pension Wise. You can contact our pension specialists for free guidance:
We’re open between 9am and 5pm, Monday to Friday. Closed on bank holidays.
You can also use our [pension guides and tools.](#)

Speak to someone who can help book your free appointment on [0800 138 3944](tel:08001383944) or use our [webchat](https://webchat.moneyhelper.org.uk/newchat/chat.aspx?domain=www.moneyhelper.org.uk).

Call between 8am to 6:30pm, Monday to Friday.
